name: a long night (austin merrick)
description:
A simple, retro, high-score based FPS that tests your reaction time and aim in an infinitely generated world.

Use headphones for the best experience as this game uses 3D audio.

+/- to change your in game sensitivity.

If experiencing issues, try using the chrome browser.

Devlog: 

Source code:

https://github.com/onsclom/mizJam (the code is pretty messy so feel free to ask how I did things)

If you want to talk about game dev, reach out to me on discord @ austin#7903. Thanks for checking out my game :^)
